original_title: บ้านพักหลังป่วนกับก๊วนเด็กเมือง
overview: The story of a northern man with good status and friends who goes to a homestay outside Chiang Mai that is about to go bankrupt and will be confiscated. There he meets the son of a villager, the owner of the homestay. The two feel destined for each other, leading to a friendship that they could never forget.
title: Country Boy
